name: Rumble
title: the Mechanized Menace

P.name: Junkyard Titan

effects.description: Innate: Rumble gains Heat whenever he uses a basic ability and loses 10 Heat per second after not using any abilities for 4 seconds. Rumble enters the Danger Zone when at or above 50 Heat, and becomes Overheated while at 100 Heat.
Danger Zone: Rumble's basic abilities are enhanced.

Overheating: Rumble's abilities are disabled for 6 seconds. During this time, his basic attacks deal 25 − 110 (based on level) (+ 30% AP) bonus magic damage while his Heat decays back to 0 over the duration.

P.notes:
While Rumble is overheating, a  Silenced icon will appear above him to signify he cannot cast abilities, this is visible to all units.
The bonus damage does not apply to structures.
P.blurb: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

Q.name: Flamespitter

effects.description: Active: Rumble activates his flamethrower for 3 seconds, gaining 20 Heat and dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies in a cone in front of him, reduced against minions.
Danger Zone: Flamespitter's damage is increased by 50%.

Q.notes:
Rumble will instantly turn to face the cursor if he is not moving when Flamespitter is cast.
Flamespitter is not canceled by  stasis effects (e.g.  Stopwatch,  Zhonya's Hourglass,  Tempered Fate).
Q.blurb: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.

W.name: Scrap Shield

effects.description: Active: Rumble shields himself for 1.5 seconds, gaining 20 Heat.
Rumble also gains bonus movement speed for the duration.
Danger Zone: Scrap Shield's effects are increased by 50%.

W.blurb: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.

E.name: Electro Harpoon

effects.description: Passive: Rumble periodically stocks an Electro Harpoon charge, up to a maximum of 2.

Active: Rumble shoots a harpoon in the target direction, gaining 10 Heat and dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them for 2 seconds. Hitting the same target with another harpoon enhances the slow, stacking additively.
Danger Zone: Electro Harpoon's effects are increased by 50%.

E.notes:
If Rumble casts Electro Harpoon before Overheating, he may still use another charge within three seconds of the initial cast.
Each Electro Harpoon cast triggers  Sheen and stacks  Force Pulse.
Electro Harpoon will cast from wherever Rumble is at the end of the cast time.
Rumble stocks an Electro Harpoon charge before the ability is even learned.
E.blurb: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.

R.name: The Equalizer

effects.description: Active: Rumble deploys a barrage of rockets along the target path, landing in a line over 1 second and lasting for 5 seconds.
Enemies within the line of rockets are dealt magic damage every 0.5 seconds, lingering for 1 second, and are slowed by 35%.

R.blurb: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.

lore: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff and sneer at his junkyard creations, Rumble doesn't mind—after all, he's the one with the flamespitter.

skins.name: Original
skins.lore: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff and sneer at his junkyard creations, Rumble doesn't mind—after all, he's the one with the flamespitter.

skins.name: Bilgerat
skins.lore: When the burdens of invention weigh too heavy on a young yordle's shoulders, there's no better choice than to take to the seas! Nothing like plunderin' and maraudin' to lend Rumble a new lease on life as he terrorizes the coasts.

skins.name: Super Galaxy
skins.lore: Founder of the Super Galaxy Defense Force, Rumble always dreamed of saving the world… with his “explosive face-melters” and “courageous giga-guards”. To this day, his allies still have no idea what those terms mean, but they don't question it—because a yordle operating a volcanic flame-spitting mech can be a very volatile thing.

skins.name: Badlands Baron
skins.lore: Nothing turns a traveler's blood cold like seeing Rumble in the distance, his iron death buggy chugging thick clouds of irradiated smoke. That means someone's got his attention, and those with Rumble's attention have a nasty habit of becoming very, very dead.

skins.name: Space Groove

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2021 Space Groove event.
This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.lore: The Retro-Futuristic Planet is tired of listening to the boring music brought by Lissandra's evil influence. Fashioning a Groove suit of his own design, Rumble now stomps across his adoptive homeworld, unleashing powerful rockets and a groovy bass track on anyone who'd keep the people from dancing.
